longBusinessSummary: NeuroMind AI Corp. does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities. It intends to focus its efforts on identifying technology companies operating primarily within the consumer internet industry in Europe, Israel, the United Arab Emirates, or the United States. The company was formerly known as Genesis Growth Tech Acquisition Corp. and changed its name to NeuroMind AI Corp. in May 2024. NeuroMind AI Corp. was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Hergiswil, Switzerland.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Michael  Lahyani
companyOfficers.title: Co-Executive Chairman of the Board, Chief Strategy Officer & President

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Eyal  Perez
companyOfficers.title: Chairman of the Board, CEO & CFO
